author: jason.carver
content: Trinity is making a lot of progress on the client-side. It's looking super promising for getting and keeping up with the head of the chain. There's more to do to make it work better in adverse conditions, but it's already a huge win over a non-witness Beam Sync. What are your thoughts on adding client-side witness collection to Beam Sync in Nethermind <@!489256758989029405> ?

author: tkstanczak
content: I want to do that a lot

author: tkstanczak
content: just temporarily cannot pick it up

author: tkstanczak
content: but I think we can add it relatively quickly

author: tkstanczak
content: just want to harden some bits ahead of eth2

content: gotcha, yeah, so many important things to work on at the same time üëç
